website_summaries.verdict: One of the longest distance laser measure devices on the market, but carries an above average price point.
pros: Excellent accuracy of 1/16 of an inch over a distance of 200 feet
Includes Bluetooth capability so you can transmit measurements wirelessly to a computer or mobile device
Will run from AAA batteries, which is handy
Provides protection against water and dust in the environment
cons: Making a Bluetooth connection can be tricky
Almost too small to hold steadily

customer_reviews.title: Works with Google Sketchup!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Disto. I also have a Windows 8.1 Lenovo Yoga 2 10.1" tablet I was able to pair with and the tablet can run Google Sketchup, so as the Disto takes measurements it transfers the measurement directly into Sketchup, so I can draw a floor plan at the same time I'm measuring- I just point a mouse in the direction the next line should go and take the measurement and it draws the line at the exact length it measured. It is a lot more efficient than sketching the room on paper, measuring everything and jotting it down in pencil, then taking that to a PC to draft. Made accurately estimating my square footage for flooring a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fantastic! I use it to measure houses to draw ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic! I use it to measure houses to draw floorplans. It's the cheapest laser measure with bluetooth, which I use to link to a tablet with a floorplan app and record all measurements to bring home and draw by hand. I would hate doing floorplans without this.
customer_reviews.author: Ray D.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOOL
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! What a great tool. Put that tape measure away when measuring square footage or lengths. It takes into consideration the tools size; simply place the tool against a wall, hit the go button -- and it gives you the distance within 1/16th inch! Want square footage of a room: turn unit on, hit the square button, measure one wall, the measure the second wall, and wala! It gives you the square footage of that room! Small, comes with a belt loop and a carrying case. Easily fits in your pocket. Gee, I sound like a salesman! Great tool. Wish I had this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: sosvar2

customer_reviews.title: Handy but Bluetooth phone apps suck
customer_reviews.text: Great little measure, but loses 2 stars because the phone apps it's supposed to work with are half baked and developer doesn't respond to issues, nor fix bugs in a timely manner, or at all. An update: they still haven't updated the app since 2017, and everyone reports it broken, so, no support whatsoever! Only thing that would make this better is if the readout would rotate so you're not reading the numbers upside down, and functional companion apps
customer_reviews.author: Peter R

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a reputable brand laser measure
customer_reviews.text: The pocketable size is great. Batteries last a long time -- perhaps not as long as in the Leica D2. It also ONLY has memory for two measurements. This is the biggest drawback in our use of it. Bluetooth option is not useful with our use of it on Android phones. It connects, but there is no app that simply records basic measurements. Probably would be useful if you wanted to use a notebook or similar.
customer_reviews.author: Dayton Family of Four

customer_reviews.title: Light and bright!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Disto. It's smaller than previous models, making it easier to carry, handle, and hold steady. I'm a real estate appraiser and it is a time saver for me. Get one!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Price

customer_reviews.title: My perfect Partner!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little tool! The bluetooth feature allows it to sync with my iPad and drawing floor plans becomes easier and more accurate! Some laser measurers go through batteries in a hurry but the DISTO keeps working for a long time just on a couple of AAA's.
customer_reviews.author: Jung Man

customer_reviews.title: ... a bit before I bought this one - works great - easy - lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Researched online quite a bit before I bought this one - works great - easy - lightweight. I carry in my computer bag or purse. Use all the time in real estate to check out room sizes. Very clear readout. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Churchill

customer_reviews.title: This tool scores a perfect 10
customer_reviews.text: Well priced, compact, accurate and easy to use and a BIG time saver Much more accurate than my tape I am able to quickly take measurements by myself that would normally require someone else to hold one end of the tape Bluetooth makes transfer to my IPad a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ely

customer_reviews.title: They don't ever break or quit, so get one your going to be happy with.  Great size.
customer_reviews.text: My son has this one, I miss it. I have the more expensive model, but this works just perfect. I will get one of these if I ever loose mine. They don't ever break or quit, so get one your going to be happy with. Great size. I am a home inspector and use it measure homes in the bright of day.
customer_reviews.author: Chesley Graham

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Xactimate mobile, battery life isn't as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use with Xactimate mobile and works well. This is advertised as being able to take 8000 measurements before having to change the batteries. I don't think that is accurate. The batteries don't securely fit on the back as I think they should.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Strong and precise!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very reliable, strong and most of all precise. The only thing that is inevitable, when used under the sun, it is very hard to find the pointer, I bought the glasses that enhance the view to finding it I would recommend you get them if you will be using this constantly under the sun. Besides that I don't leave with out it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: The architects I work with like this model because it's small and lightweight. It fits into a pocket, purse, or briefcase easily. It's slim enough to fit into most hands easily too. Very accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I’m an architect and this thing can do distance and area with a touch of a button. The Bluetooth also allows you to hook it up to sketch up!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Lack of workable software that doesn't take half a day to get downloaded.
customer_reviews.text: The laser measurement devices is fine. What's not fine is finding and downloading the software for measurement plotting. Downloading DISTO is painfull and doesn't work well once you get it loaded. A dick with proven software delivered with the device would be much appreciated. Cheers, Alan
customer_reviews.author: Alan Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Solid, works.  Easy.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice so far. Bluetooth working on my estimate /ipad seamless. Dropped it the other day. No issues. Will buy another one As backup.
customer_reviews.author: Ken C

customer_reviews.title: Solid effective, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent easy to use item, Bluetooth is in the long run not worth it in my opinion because of the low quality app no need to overspend on the hight level items
customer_reviews.author: WTB

customer_reviews.title: Work's fine
customer_reviews.text: Device works great. Only reason for the 4 stars is the sketch app and blue tooth. They also work fine but have not saved me any time on site scoping an insurance claim. For half the price you can get a laser tape without blue tooth that works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this for measuring in my business. It is very hard to hold the unit and press the button at the same time without moving. I never trusted the measurement and went back to using a tape measure. It has been sitting on my desk gathering dust.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, accurate and fast!
customer_reviews.text: Leica makes a pretty consistent laser measuring tool. As a pro trim carpenter these puppies are game changers in their ability to nail long measurements with exacting accuracy. No more need to get a helper to hold the end of a tape (in most applications).
customer_reviews.author: James A Fish

customer_reviews.title: Package had been opened and the batteries were gone.
customer_reviews.text: Received the product and could see the package had been previously opened. The description states that the batteries are included. There were no batteries in my package. Clearly someone had opened the package, removed the batteries, and then sold it as new and complete. Small detail, but very shady!
customer_reviews.author: Armadillo Roofing

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, bright laser, accurate reading bluetooth enabled is greatr. Just wish there were more apps using this device
customer_reviews.author: kpezz

customer_reviews.title: If you have plenty of money
customer_reviews.text: In the sun it doesn't work great, but inside works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Barron

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is must-have
customer_reviews.text: One of the few in this price range that includes Bluetooth, which I think is a must-have feature. Great ay gizmo makes measuring rooms painless. I use it with Leica Sketch and Room Planner apps.
customer_reviews.author: Hard T. PleaseTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy for ease of use and portability
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Small enough to carry in my pocket all the time. I like that you can set it to read in ONLY inches for CAD input and can change it to Ft/inches for general work. The BT connectivity is nice but I have to use it more to see if it will fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Better than a tape measure
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly pairs with my iPad with the measuring program I use. Lightweight and accurate reads.
customer_reviews.author: jbcarter07

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Saves me time on measuring.
customer_reviews.text: I love this device! Saves me time on measuring. Easy to use. Found out how to change the battery on youtube. Great little device!
customer_reviews.author: In Milwaukee

customer_reviews.title: Highly accurate and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome compact product that is deadly accurate. the Bluetooth connection to my CAD application is a true time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anderson

customer_reviews.title: ... little finicky about surfaces but works well and I love the size
customer_reviews.text: a little finicky about surfaces but works well and I love the size.

customer_reviews.title: Disto E7100i
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this tool to anyone who needs a no frills laser measuring tool It's small and the screen is easy to read. I would by this tool again

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent, wish the app that you can get would be more advance then what it is now.

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor measuring tool!
customer_reviews.text: No more 100’ long tapes needed to measure large indoor areas. Very accurate.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it was intended to.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is intended to. I love the size and the weight, but if you are planning on using this thing in a career, spring for the bigger blutooth capable disto. Cons~ because of its size the base isn't big enough to lay flush on the wall

customer_reviews.title: good measuring tool.
customer_reviews.text: Use this to make molding drawings in customer's house's. Works well for my purpose.

customer_reviews.text: It works great, but the small size makes it difficult to hold flat against a wall. its also awkward to press the buttons while holding against a wall.

customer_reviews.title: perfect.
customer_reviews.text: this thing is amazing. perfect and the perfect price. love the small size and the bluetooth works flawlessly. can't imagine why you would need a bigger and more expensive one...

customer_reviews.title: Have already purchased a second one for another member of our team. 😄

customer_reviews.title: A real time saver
customer_reviews.text: Works really well with Samsung Note 4, very accurate and a real time saver. A good deal for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Best price Bluetooth L
customer_reviews.text: Best price Bluetooth L.D.M on the tape on the market .

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Blue tooth is awesome works great and is very little.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Flinn

customer_reviews.title: Works great, app works great, makes measuring easy, fast and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Works great, we use it in a professional environment. The app functions well and makes it quick to take measurements and record. Highly recommend if your measuring spaces with a tape measure.

customer_reviews.title: The Bluetooth is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice distance meter for the money. The Bluetooth feature really makes measuring as-builts go quickly.

customer_reviews.text: Works great! I use it to make quick and time saving measurements. I use family planner app on my ipad.

customer_reviews.title: ... smaller than I thought it would be which is great. Super quick readings and very accurate so far
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought it would be which is great. Super quick readings and very accurate so far.

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent tool!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a tape measure for years until I started using the Disto. It takes half the time to measure with much more accurate results.
customer_reviews.author: Jonno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm an insurance adjuster. It works as advertised. Does use batteries fast.

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked as we needed it to. I was familiar with the Leica Disto products so I did not have many doubts about what it would do. More expensive than the big box lasers, but well worth it

customer_reviews.title: Time saver!
customer_reviews.text: Works great work the my measures program. Push the button and the measurement goes right to your iPad. Very convenient!

customer_reviews.title: Compact laser!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate laser, but I'm already waiting on a replacement after a weeks use.
customer_reviews.author: ELMO L SILVA JR

customer_reviews.title: it's a great device - range
customer_reviews.text: This device chews up batteries and spits them out. Make sure you have purchased a 12pack of AAAs to keep close at hand. Other than that, it's a great device - range, viewability of the laser, accuracy, integration with MagicPlan and Chief Architect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy N. Shank

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this and I'm so glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this and I'm so glad I bought it. It has saved me countless hours over the last two years. Its blue tooth uploads directly to my phone. Coupled with the right smartphone apps it allows me to capture accurate measurement data and even create simple floor plans in the field using only my phone and this LDM. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: My Punchlist

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with the E7100i
customer_reviews.text: I use this in conjunction with MagicPlan to draw out and measure floor plans for real estate purposes. The E7100i is incredible! It's compact, easy to use, and the low power bluetooth function works perfectly with my Nexus 6, 7, and 10. Beats using a measure tape any day of the week for both speed and accuracy. It's got a lifetime warranty card that comes with it as well, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, just wish I could change it to 1/16 inch measurements instead of 1/32
customer_reviews.author: Dan E Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great for the
customer_reviews.text: Much more compact than the last model. Clips to your pocket while you work. Easy to use and great for the money

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: Nice measurement tool. Accurate, good size, easy to use. Not exactly what I want though, retuned it, I needed more functions.
customer_reviews.author: GREG YOUNG

customer_reviews.title: Great for my work
customer_reviews.text: Accurate to a 32nd of an inch! Great for my work!
customer_reviews.author: Alamomikel

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product before. I dropped and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before. I dropped and broke the one I had for 7 years and replaced it with another.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Scott

customer_reviews.title: This is a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is a waste of money. This is the second one that I've bought thought Amazon. The product does not connect to my Bluetooth systems. I've tried four different computers and two Android devices thinking it must be the system. Countless hours on the phone with paid support and numerous hours researching the potential problem. In the end, the second Denise that I bought is also bad. Beware! Amazon must be getting second tier quality products from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Rich K.

customer_reviews.title: so I bought the $600 leica disto E7500i it was over kill and a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: leica had me return it. defective.... so I bought the $600 leica disto E7500i it was over kill and a waste of money. But it works. Now I need to not lose it.
customer_reviews.author: The Rupp’s

customer_reviews.title: It worked great, until it quit working.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it worked great until it didn't. I've had it for 2 months. It's been kept dry and it wasn't banged around. It quit working right in the middle of an inspection. Looks like I missed the return policy by a month.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Arden

customer_reviews.title: Does not play well with others
customer_reviews.text: I was assured this unit would interface (Bluetooth) with my iOS excel spreadsheet on either my phone or the iPad, it doesn't! So I went out and bought a Samsung Galaxy notepad. It works but here's an example of the entry (5.05 13/32) notice the combination of decimal and fraction. I am now a known customer at the Leica disto help center, with no help. Now I'm returning the android notepad and having to upgrade to a windows based notepad and possibly to the 330i or the e7500i to be able to get the excel spreadsheet entries I need. If this were a child I would have to give it the title "does not play well with others"
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S

customer_reviews.title: Game changer, Huge difference from the cheaper models.
customer_reviews.text: Quick, accurate and when you pair with the Bluetooth app, it'll change your world. It does take some time to re-train yourself, but its pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: JoshuaM

customer_reviews.title: Slickest measuring tool ever.
customer_reviews.text: Slickest digital measuring tool ever. Has more capability then I need. It's simple to use. Simple to carry. The application is a little combersom.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K.

product_meta.title: Leica DISTO E7100i 200ft Laser Distance Measure with Bluetooth, Black/Red
product_meta.description: Style:LaserThe new Leica DISTO E7100i is the first laser distance meter with Bluetooth Smart that easily fits into your pocket. Measuring just 4. 72 inches long, 1. 5 inches wide, 0. 9 inches thick, and wieghing in at 3. 25 ounces, it not only fits in your pocket but also in your personal bag or tool pouch with ease. Whether you need a quick material estimation or you work on a home improvement project, the Leica DISTO E7100i with integrated Bluetooth Smart and the free Leica DISTO sketch app offers you endless possibilities to create sketches, generate floor plans, or document your measurements with pictures using a smartphone or a tablet and the free apps. Additional apps that integrate the Disto may be found from your favorite 3rd party developers as well. This unit measures up to 200 feet with 1. 5mm (~1/16 inch) accuracy. Features include 2 line back light display, area calculations, contunuous measuring mode. Units of measure include your choice of feet/inches/fractions, inches/fractions, decimal feet, and metric. It's powered with 2 AAA batteries and includes a lanyard and nylon pouch.
feature_bullets: This unit contains a Class II Laser with 1mW output
1/16" ACCURACY up to 200-FEET MEASURING RANGE. That's right, a sixteenth of an inch. Take out a pair of earbuds. Look at how wide the 1/8" jack is. Now divide that by half.
BLUETOOTH 4.0 for transferring measurements into desired software. Send measurements directly from the laser measure to your apps using the Leica DISTO Bluetooth Smart (4.0) wireless data transfer.
IP54 CERTIFIED - DUST & SPLASH PROTECTED. Per set of AAA Batteries, capture up to 5,000 measurements.
MIN/MAX FUNCTION. In Min/Max mode, you "sweep" the laser point into a corner. The longest measurement is recorded. Very useful for accurate diagonal room or window/door measurements.
AREA/VOLUME FUNCTION. In Area Mode, this laser distance measure determines the area of a rectangle or square in two shots. Volume Mode adds a third vertical shot to calculate volume.

specifications.Included Components: DISTO E7100i, pocket clip, quick start guide
specifications.Warranty Description: 2 Years from date of purchase or register device within 8 week of purcahse for 3 year warranty
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars167 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
